channel.title: NoblePK
channel.description:
[COLOR="#FF0000"][SIZE=7]Play now: [URL=http://"http://www.noblepkz.webs.com"]http://www.noblepkz.webs.com[/URL][/SIZE][/COLOR]
About a year ago I ran the 317 RSPS NoblePK. We ran into difficulty and had to shut it down.
We are back with a 718!
This server is Eco Based, built from PKing up.
[U]Features:[/U]
All bosses active - (QBD, Kiln, Nex etc, etc.) All Skills working Squeal of Fortune (You earn spins with every 2 hour playtime, this is accumulative) PERFECT switching Want Bandos etc. in shops? Tough. You won't find them here. We have a custom shop area with everything a player would need! Dominion Tower Active dicing/flower game groups Active clans, with Castlewars + Clan wars Many many more!
We have ensured that all players, whether you are PvP or PvM, that you receive the BEST server experience with our friendly owners and staff that take in every suggestion made!
[IMG]http://img255.imageshack.us/img255/408/noblepkz.png[/img] [IMG]http://img42.imageshack.us/img42/2036/spins.png[/img]
